name: Resource
desc: A resource to bundle with the Swift package.

items.name: static func process(String, localization: Resource.Localization?) -> Resource
items.desc: Applies platform-specific rules to the resource at the given path.

items.name: enum Resource.Localization
items.desc: Defines the explicit type of localization for resources.

items.name: static func copy(String) -> Resource
items.desc: Applies the copy rule to a resource at the given path.

items.name: func encode(to: Encoder)
items.desc: Encodes this value into the given encoder.
